title: Achieving Reversible Zn Chemistry by Constructing a Built-in Internal Electric Field to Dynamically Eliminate the Local Charge Accumulation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01313A, Paper
Xueru Yang, Zhaoyu Zhang, Yufei Zhang, Wencheng Du, Minghui Ye, Yongchao Tang, Zhipeng Wen, Xiaoqing Liu, Chengchao Li
The irreversible chemistry of Zn anode, attributed to dendrite growth and parasitic side reactions, is the major constraint for the practical application of aqueous zinc ion batteries. Herein, polyelectrolyte complexes...
